Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Client}},
The new year brings many exciting changes for TriTech customers. We are planning on attending selected regional tradeshows to see many more of you on the road, as well as implementing more training programs to help enhance your use of the Perform Software.
Another recent change has been in the realignment of our Client Account Managers (CAM). We are pleased to introduce David Bell as the CAM for your agency. David will be responsible for any new product quotes or demonstrations that you may need. He has been with TriTech for 3 years as a CAM and is excited about the opportunity to work with your agency.
